name: isidom
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, cidom), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, cdomn)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cidom), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, cdomn)))
-| wceq(cidom, cin(ccrg, cdomn))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ IDomn ↔(c0 ∈ CRing ∧ c0 ∈ Domn))
⊣ IDomn =(CRing ⋂ Domn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cidom), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, cdomn)))
-| wceq(cidom, cin(ccrg, cdomn))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ IDomn ↔(c0 ∈ CRing ∧ c0 ∈ Domn))
⊣ IDomn =(CRing ⋂ Domn)

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cidom), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, cdomn)))

comment: An integral domain is a commutative domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2015.)
